headline: US Warns of Blackouts in Precursor to Help Coal
summary: (Bloomberg) -- Blackouts in the US could skyrocket by 2030 amid an expected increase in power demand brought on by AI, according to a Trump administration report seen as a precursor to a broader intervention to help keep coal-fired power plants from closing early.
